#Text=Tanzio da Varallo
#Text=Antonio d'Enrico , called Tanzio da Varallo , or simply il Tanzio [ 1 ] ( c. 1575/1580 – c. 1632/1633 ) was an Italian painter of the late- Mannerist or early Baroque period .
#Text=Biography

#Text=He was born in Riale d’Alagna , and was active mainly in Lombardy and Piedmont , including the Sacro Monte at Varallo Sesia , where he worked contemporaneously with Pier Francesco Mazzucchelli ( il Morazzone ) .
#Text=He painted a Circumcision for Fara San Martino , and a Virgin with saints for the Collegiate at Pescocostanzo .

#Text=Some of his paintings acquire the influence of Tenebrist styles and morbid thematic characteristic of the followers of Caravaggio and also of many Lombard painters , including his somewhat gruesome David with Goliath ( 1620 ) .

#Text=His animated and crowded Battle of Sennacherib ( 1627 – 28 ) for the Basilica of San Gaudenzio [ 2 ] reflects the influence of his work in the Sacri Monti of Piedmont and Lombardy , painting scenographic diorama scenes .
#Text=His brother Melchiorre was also a painter , studied in Milan , and painted a last judgement for the parish of Riva . [ 3 ]
#Text=Works
#Text=Madonna col Bambino , San Francesco e donatore , oil on canvas , c. 1610 , Colledimezzo ( CH ) , parish church of San Giovanni Evangelista .
#Text=Circumcision , oil on canvas , c. 1610 , Fara San Martino ( CH ) , church of San Remigio .
#Text=Pentecost ( 5 fragments ) , oil on canvas , Naples , previously in church of Santa Restituta , now in the Museo di Capodimonte .
#Text=Madonna dell'incendio sedato , oil on canvas , 1614 , Pescocostanzo ( AQ ) , collegiate church of Santa Maria in Colle .
#Text=San Carlo attends those afflicted with plague , oil on canvas , 1615 – 16 , Domodossola ( VB ) , collegiate church of Santi Gervasio e Protasio .
#Text=Sant'Antonio da Padova , oil on canvas , Varallo Sesia , Pinacoteca Civica .
#Text=San Sebastiano curato da Sant'Irene e un angelo , oil on canvas , National Gallery of Art , Washington , Samuel H. Kress Collection .
